##JHU

### 08 January 2018


```{r, echo =FALSE}
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()
JHU <- c("<a href= 'https://www.jhu.edu/' >JHU</a>")
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat=54.735, lng=29.022, popup = JHU) 
```
